uk.ac.manchester.cs

Class BOMSafeJavaCharStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.BOMSafeJavaCharStream
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaCharStream, JavaCharStream, JavaCharStream, JavaCharStream, JavaCharStream, JavaCharStream

    public class BOMSafeJavaCharStream
extends Object
    JavaCC generated JavaCharStream with added treatment for BOMs.
